attributes.action: NO CONFIDENCE IN THE COALITION AS A GOVERNMENT
attributes.additional_details:
A debate in parliament regarding the Governments skill in handling the needs of the British Public, financially and socially, followed by a Vote of No Confidence.

The Coalition have no knowledge of the needs and hopes of the British Public.
People provide prosperity for themselves and the Country through creating Business and providing work for all.
All the Government discuss are numbers, not people.
People need some hope for their families today, not in 5, 10 or 15 years time.
